#include<stdio.h>
#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#include<algorithm>
#define pb push_back
#define ll long long int
using namespace std;
int s[107],s1[107];
vector<int> v;
ll fact(int n)
{
	ll o=1;
	ll i;
	n=(ll)n;
	for(i=2;i<=n;i++) o*=i;
	return o;
}
int main()
{
	int t,i,k,j,e,n,p;
	ll n1,p1,np,out;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	for(i=0;i<t;i++)
	{
		for(j=0;j<11;j++)
		{
		 scanf("%d ",&e);
		 v.pb(e);
		 s[e]++;
	    }
	    sort(v.begin(),v.end());
	    scanf("%d",&k);
	    for(j=0,e=10;j<k;j++,e--) s1[v[e]]++;
        e++;
        n=s[v[e]];
        p=s1[v[e]];
        //printf("%d %d\n",n,p);
        n1=fact(n);
        p1=fact(p);
        np=fact(n-p);
        //printf("%lld %lld %lld\n",n1,p1,np);
        out=(n1/(np*p1));
        printf("%lld\n",out);
        v.clear();
        memset(s,0,sizeof(s));
        memset(s1,0,sizeof(s1));
	}
	return 0;
}
